biography.value:
A kind of yugoloth, dhergoloths rush into battle like whirlwinds of destruction, lashing out with the five sets of claws that extend from their squat, barrel-shaped bodies. They take contracts to put down uprisings, clear out rabble, and eliminate scouts and skirmishers, and they revel in the butchery they create, their gleeful laughter rising above their victims’ screams.

Since dhergoloths are little more than brutes, employers must use caution when instructing them. They can handle simple orders that don’t take a lot of time to resolve. When given anything complex to do, however, they either forget what they’re told or don’t listen in the first place, and then bungle the task that was set for them.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The dhergoloth makes two Claw attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=force average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The dhergoloth moves up to its speed in a straight &Reference[line]{line} and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target must succeed on a [[/save dex 14 format=long]] or take [[/damage 3d12 + 3 type=force average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The dhergoloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no &Reference[material]{material} components and using &Reference[cha]{Charisma} as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 10):

At will: darkness, fear

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The dhergoloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Magic Resistance. The dhergoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius &Reference[sphere]{sphere} for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision} can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

You project a phantasmal image of a creature’s worst fears. Each creature in a 30-foot &Reference[cone]{cone} must succeed on a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become &Reference[frightened]{frightened} for the duration.

While &Reference[frightened]{frightened} by this spell, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from you by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn’t have &Reference[line]{line} of sight to you, the creature can make a &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends for that creature.
